EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR.Send Email 4a - Thank you.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for joining our recent IHL/NCR Webinar on the transformative power of self-checkouts for convenience retailers.
To learn more about NCR’s Self-Checkout options that may be a great fit for {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}, just contact us <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]> and we’ll give you a call back to see how we can help.
No risk, no hard sell—just information.
In the meantime, join us <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=e5adc1243e9a5422c3781567f281a312b]]> for an upcoming webinar about the factors you need to consider when you're evaluating the right fit for self-service in your store—from the essentials of a successful pilot project to staff training and change management.Webinar: Self-Checkout: Key Best Practices for SuccessDate: Thursday, November 12, 2020 Time: 2p.m. Eastern Standard Time ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
